Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Trim tab actuator binding. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
